browserAction.description: This text shows up when the icon is hovered in the web interface.

choosePDFDocument.description: A button label for a file upload button

dropFileHere.description: Instruction showing while draggin a file.

errorMessage.description: Mini header before list of error data.

mailSupportWithErrorMessage.message: By emailing the error message below to $EMAILLINK$, you help us make the service even better.

noPDFFound.description: Shown as to inform the user why it is not possible to print to e-sign this page/document.
noPDFFound.message: We could not find a PDF on this page.

oauthInstructions.message: To get started with $EXTENSIONNAME$, you must authenticate to Scrive. Press the button to start.

orDragAndDrop.description: Start with a non-capital letter. Shown underneath the button that instructs the user to upload a file.
orDragAndDrop.message: or drag and drop a PDF file here

printToPaperQuestion.description: Header of popup when there is no PDF detected on the page

printerUrlOptionLabel.description: Label for an option where a URL is inputted.

saved.description: Text displayed when saving was successful.

startEsigningQuestion.description: The header of the popup, after the user has selected to print to e-sign

systemInformation.description: Header above system information such as url/time/version/operating system

wait.description: Displayed when we are waiting for something. Dots are appended after it, moving so that it feels like something is happening.
